sect1.title: IBM DB2 notes DB2notes
sect1.para:
To use &mnogo; with IBM DB2 database, add the following lines to Apache's httpd.conf:
SetEnv DB2DIR /usr/IBMdb2/V7.1 SetEnv DB2INSTANCE db2 PassEnv DB2DIR DB2INSTANCE
Where DB2DIR is the path to DB2 installation, and DB2INSTANCE is the DB2 instance that &search.cgi; should use.
